Title: WPForms
Description: WPForms is simple framework for Form-driven Silverlight Windows Phone applications. Using the framework allows developers to easily create and display forms.
HomeWiki:
Welcome to WPForms

Overview

WPForms is simple framework for Form-driven Silverlight Windows Phone applications. Using the framework allows developers to easily create and display forms.

Intented audience

WPForms is intented for software developers building form-driven windows phone applications.

Getting started

  • Download the framework
  • Read documentation
  • Read getting started
